snippet.title: Kind Words 2 - Official Trailer | Day of the Devs: The Game Awards Edition Digital Showcase 2023
snippet.description: The development team at Popcannibal reveal Kind Words 2, an upcoming sequel to Kind Words (Lo Fi Chill Beats to Write to). In Kind Words, players can write letters to players about their problems, dreams, and more and receive kind responses. Watch the video as the developers dive into what you can expect from Kind Words 2 (Lo Fi City Pop), and explore the city setting of the sequel where players have different ways to communicate. The video showcases how you can write poetry, write wishes on the night sky, and more. The Steam page is live now, and playtest signups are available.
